instructions:
Fry and cut up bacon; set aside. Sauté green pepper, celery, garlic and onion in bacon grease; set aside.
Scramble egg in frying pan and chop. Add rice, bacon and sautéed vegetables to frying pan; add soy sauce
and reheat. Serves 6. 
*(Rev. 8/7/92)*
name: Fried Rice
creator: Cora Decker
